update_log.change: Added mode and ad_fees_prices pre-time fees parameters

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Partner ID assigned post registration (provided by administrator)

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is a datetime by timestamp of the request. Required for signature authentication

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: The MD5 hash of all query parameters, sorted by ASCII code. Can only be called one time and expires in 5 mins

error_codes.description: There's no access, failed to login

notes: The documentation includes Common Parameters, Required Parameters, Response Parameters, Request Examples, Response Examples and Error Codes sections. There are also API permission details and an update log at the bottom of the page.
